Download latest distribution from [http://code.google.com/p/harviewer/downloads/list Downloads] section, unzip and copy on your PHP enabled web server.

=== Introduction ===

HAR Viewer is an open source tool that helps to preview existing HAR (HTTP Archive) files. These files contains recorded information about HTTP traffic performed by web pages.

  * See [http://groups.google.com/group/firebug-working-group/web/http-tracing---export-format HAR spec] to understand structure of a HAR file.
  * See [http://groups.google.com/group/http-archive-specification/web/har-adopters?hl=en List of tools] supporting HAR.
  * Check out [http://www.softwareishard.com/har/viewer/ HAR Viewer] online.
  * Use [http://www.softwareishard.com/blog/netexport/ Firebug/NetExport] to monitor HTTP traffic and save collected info into a HAR file.

=== Setup ===

Following steps describe how to build own distribution HAR Viewer on your local machine.

  * Checkout HAR Viewer source code from SVN (read only copy)
  {{{svn checkout http://harviewer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ harviewer}}}

  * Build distribution by running [http://ant.apache.org/ ant] in the root directory
  {{{ant}}}

  * New *Release* directory is created. Copy content of this directory on to your PHP enabled web server.

=== Pages ===

The viewer provides two pages that can be used to preview a HAR file.

  * {{{index.php}}} The main HAR Viewer page that shows detailed information summary about loaded HAR file(s).

  * {{{pagelist.php}}} Simplified preview of a single HAR file. Can be used as embedded iframe withing another page (e.g. blog post). This page expects one parameter {{{path}}} that specifies location of the input HAR file.
